gameworld

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class the contains the logic for game play. It also connects the rooms va their doors so that players can move between rooms.
    Author:
    Latrell Whata 300417220

    • Method Detail

      • initialRotate

        private void initialRotate(java.lang.String initDir)
        This method sets up the rooms and their rotations to the state from the XML file.
        Parameters:
        initDir - the initial direction tells the room when to stop rotating to get back to its initial state

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(int dx,
                       int dy)
        This method moves the player from its current position to a new tile.
        Parameters:
        dx - the difference between the row values
        dy - the difference between the column values

      • directTeleport

        public void directTeleport(Room room,
                           int row,
                           int col)
        This method is a helper for the test class. It enables a player to be directly moved to a room at a specific tile.
        Parameters:
        room - the destination room
        row - the row value of the new player tile
        col - the column value of the new player tile
